en.HELP_MESSAGE: You can say tell me edx fact, or, you can say exit... What can I help you with?
en.HELP_REPROMPT: What can I help you with?
en.FALLBACK_MESSAGE: The edx Facts skill can't help you with that. How irritating. Please try  saying tell me an edx fact ?
en.FALLBACK_REPROMPT: What can I help you with?
FACTS: 2/3 of CS50 course takers have never taken a Computer Science course before.
Although David J Malan brilliantly hosts CS50 at the moment, one day Neil Dixit will host CS50 just as brilliantly.
David Malan sometimes use ridiculous representations of Computer Science, but they still have the desired effect and are extremely intuitive.ğŸ¤£
Unlike many Computer Science Courses, CS50 teaches, not one, not two, not 3, but a whopping 10 Computer languages.ğŸ”Ÿ
CS50 was filmed on the Harvard University Campus. It is definitely the most famous Computer Science Course in the world!
Even though CS50 is supposed to take up to 9 weeks, it is totally worth it, and has definitely changed many lives.
Computers used to be an enigma, now my name is Alan Turing.
My favorite part of CS fifty is seeing cool duck on stage. LOL!
CS fifty makes you look at a semi colon in a whole new light
I wish compiler had more meaninful messages for errors.
